title: Leading 5 selling countries of IKEA products 2018
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Sales share in each Country on the y axis.
The Sales share is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country United Kingdom.
The Sales share of Country Germany is 2.5% larger than the minimum value at United Kingdom.
